name: Rosa's game
description:
Rosa's Game.

Happy Birthday Rosa! Collect all the ingredients for your party and celebrate your birthday together with your friends. 

There are also two pieces of cake to be found in secret parts of the level, collect them and enjoy an extra special birthday!

Controls:

Use the right and left arrow keys to control Rosa, and use the Spacebar to jump. You can also use a controller.

Notes:

A small game I made for Rosa her birthday. You can play this in the browser.  Credits for assets go to:

  • Fruit+: https://ninjikin.itch.io/fruit
  • Character base: https://zegley.itch.io/2d-platformermetroidvania-asset-pack
  • Tileset: https://anokolisa.itch.io/basic-140-tiles-grassland-and-mines
